full_summary:
**RFP YVR Air Cargo – DSSA Modifications**
============================

**Reference Number:** WS4392020246-Doc4392346148
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS4392020246

**Public Notice Date:** January 12, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
[Note: This is the initial closing time; see below for correction]

**Amendment Date:** February 19, 2024

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Traditional

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Building and Facility Maintenance and Repair Services)

**Trade Agreements:** This RFP is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

**Tender Status:** 

**Eligible Regions:** 

**Regions for Delivery:** British Columbia

**Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Procurement Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the YVR Airport Authority, is seeking Proposals for modifications to the DSSA (Direct Support Station Air) to allow for the concurrent use of the fume hood.

**Submissions Required:**

* Complete Proposals must be submitted by **January 31, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST** to be considered.
* All required supporting documentation must be included with the Proposal submission.
* Any Proposals submitted after the specified deadline will be deemed non-responsive.

**Request for Proposal Documents:**

* This is an electronic bidding process. Proposers must submit their Proposals through the Canada Buys or Ariba Discovery website.

**Contact Information:**

* For more information, please contact Marie-Ève Bouchard at marie
